purpose: The email invites colleagues to apply for Europe's Only Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER 2025).
evidence_sentences: Join Europe's Only Summer School on Informatics Education Research (SCHIER 2025)!
Applications remain open until July 11th or until all spots are filled.
Building on the success of its inaugural edition last year, SCHIER 2025 offers a week of:
Expert-led lectures and interactive sessions on key topics and methodologies.
Collaborative discussions on emerging research challenges.
Networking opportunities that foster meaningful, long-term collaboration and advancement.
Special Presentation on 'Education in Quantum Computing' by Fabio Scafirimuto, IBM Quantum Education and Workforce Development EMEA Team Lead.
[Who should attend] PhD students, postdocs, and researchers with an interest in Informatics Education Research
Learn more and apply now: https://tinyurl.com/5pbfk85e
Share flyers with your students and colleagues: https://tinyurl.com/3syjsypf
